resources.string: You have an older version of the app.\nKindly update to get the latest version for best experience.

Dialup app has all the USSD codes and emergency numbers you need. \n\nThe app contains the USSD codes for banks, telecoms, TV subscription, health services, etc. It also contains emergency and quick response numbers for important agencies like the Police, Rape Complaint Centre, Quick Response Squad, Fire Service, etc.
Developed with ❤️ by Mendhie Emmanuel \n\nCodes curated by Mendhie Emmanuel and Nwugo Jaachimma
Logo designed by Nsikak Owo \n\nRoyalty-free illustrations from Pablo, Rawpixel, and Thierry
